install.requete: ALTER TABLE `a_users` ADD `messagerie_copie_mail` binary(1) NOT NULL default '1', ADD `messagerie_accepter_mp` binary(1) NOT NULL default '1', ADD `messagerie_accepter_mail` binary(1) NOT NULL default '1', ADD `messagerie_absent_site` binary(1) NOT NULL default '0', ADD `messagerie_absent_site_msg` text;

CREATE TABLE `a_mod_messagerie` ( `id_mp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `userid_from` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `sujet` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `message` text NOT NULL, `date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `destinataires` varchar(250) NOT NULL default '', `sujet_initial` int(11) unsigned default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_mp`), FULLTEXT KEY `message` (`message`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `a_mod_messagerie_etat` ( `id_mp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `userid_dest` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `etat` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `cat` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id_mp`,`userid_dest`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
